ygData.subject: Lambent Stone Costs (was: re: AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bah! Last night in High Keep some wizard was auctioning a lambent stone for 100pp.  A friend of mine asked me if I was interested - I declined.  He then
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Tue, 09 Nov 1999 08:41:09 -0800
> From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>
>Subject: Re: AC Dilemma
>
>Well, so far on E'Ci. I've had 4 different people attempt to charge me
>100pp for a stone. One of them I whined to and they finally gave it to me
>for free (apparently they had a friend in my guild or something). All the
>others said they'd sold many for 100ppk, and had no intention of selling it
>to me for less. It's unfortunate that the higher level bards are dumping
>money on these such that us lower level bards (I can kill hill giants
>pretty well in a decent group at 29, but it's hard to get that group
>together) can't afford them. I mean geez! The armor is expensive enough
>as it is! ~200pp for the damn lambent sapphires! Wish we could somehow
>spread the word to not pay that much for these things.
>
>Laluni Songhammer, Level 29 bard of E'Ci

Bah! Last night in High Keep some wizard was auctioning a lambent stone for
100pp. A friend of mine asked me if I was interested - I declined. He then
offered to front me the cash, to which I replied, "No, thanks, I have the
cash, I just don't want to do that to the economy." I would pay as much as
30pp, perhaps, but never more than that... and frankly that would be pretty
steep, in my opinion. We need to stick together and refuse these exorbitant
prices! Sadly, there are those who will pay these prices, especially on old,
rich servers such as ours. <shrug> The prices should stabilize once the
rich twinkers have all their toys, I hope.

Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
28 songs and going strong,
Out of my rut and off my butt...
